Developer Interface¶

hmmlogo¶

This package is used to visualize profile hidden Markov models. Basic usage:

>>> import hmmlogo
>>> hmmlogo.show_logo('PF00010')
<Figure Object>

hmmlogo.api¶

This module implements the hmmlogo API.

hmmlogo.api.get_hmm(accession)¶

Constructs a HiddenMarkovModel.

Parameters

accession – Pfam accession number for protein family.

Returns

HiddenMarkovModel object

Return type

hmmlogo.HiddenMarkovModel

hmmlogo.api.get_logo(accession, **kwargs)¶

Constructs a SequenceLogo.

Parameters

  • accession – Pfam accession number for protein family.

  • **kwargs – Optional arguments for SequenceLogo.

Returns

SequenceLogo object

Return type

hmmlogo.SequenceLogo

hmmlogo
